mapper.select: SELECT QA.QA_NO, QA.Q_NO, QA.ANSWER_YN, QA.SECRET_YN, QA.TITLE, QA.REG_USER_NO, USER.USER_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(QA.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS REG_DT, QA.PARENT_USER_NO FROM QA_INFO QA, USER_INFO USER WHERE USER.USER_NO = QA.REG_USER_NO ORDER BY QA.Q_NO DESC, QA.ANSWER_YN ASC LIMIT 6;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QA_INFO (QA_NO, Q_NO, ANSWER_YN, SECRET_YN, TITLE, CONTENTS, FILE_NAME, FILE_ORG_NAME, FILE_PATH, REG_USER_NO, REG_DT) VALUES ( (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(QA.QA_NO),10000000)+1 FROM QA_INFO QA), (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(QA.Q_NO),10000000)+1 FROM QA_INFO QA), 'N', #{secret_yn}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{file_name}, #{file_org_name}, #{file_path}, #{reg_user_no}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT QA.QA_NO, QA.Q_NO, QA.ANSWER_YN, QA.SECRET_YN, QA.TITLE, QA.CONTENTS, QA.FILE_NAME, QA.FILE_ORG_NAME, QA.FILE_PATH, QA.REG_USER_NO, USER.USER_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(QA.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS REG_DT FROM QA_INFO QA, USER_INFO USER WHERE QA.QA_NO = #{qa_no} AND QA.REG_USER_NO = USER.USER_NO
mapper.update: UPDATE QA_INFO SET SECRET_YN = #{secret_yn}, TITLE = #{title}, CONTENTS = #{contents}, CHG_USER_NO = #{reg_user_no}, CHG_DT = NOW() WHERE QA_NO = #{qa_no} AND ANSWER_YN = 'N'
